support.title: Support Center
support.subtitle: Contact us for your questions, suggestions or technical support. We will try to help you as soon as possible.
support.name: Name
support.subject: Subject
support.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
support.error: An error occurred while sending the message.
support.faq1: How do I add my Xtreme Code account?
support.faq1Answer: Click on the "Xtreme Code" card from the home page, then click the "Add New Account" button. Enter your server URL, username and password.
support.faq2: How do I load an M3U playlist?
support.faq2Answer: Click on the "M3U Playlist" card from the home page, enter your M3U file URL and click the "Load" button.
support.faq3: Video is not playing, what should I do?
support.faq3Answer: First check your internet connection. If the problem persists, check your account information and refresh the page. If the problem continues, contact our support team.
support.replySent: Your reply has been sent successfully!
support.ticketClosed: This support ticket is closed. No new replies can be added.
support.myTicketsDesc: View and manage your support tickets
support.loginRequired: Please log in to view your support tickets

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text1: These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legal agreement between you ("User", "You", "Your") and us ("Platform", "Service", "We", "Our") regarding your use of the IPTV Manager platform. By using this platform, you are deemed to have accepted these Terms. If you do not accept these Terms, please do not use the platform.
terms.section1Text2: We reserve the right to change these Terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes. Your continued use of the platform after changes means you accept the updated Terms.
terms.section2Text1: IPTV Manager is a management platform that enables users to manage, view, and organize IPTV content in Xtreme Code API and M3U playlist formats. The platform provides tools for users to manage their own IPTV accounts and content.
terms.section2Text2: The platform is a tool that helps users manage their own provided IPTV accounts and content. The platform does not provide or distribute IPTV content; it only allows users to manage their own accounts.
terms.section3_1Text: You are responsible for the security of your account. You must keep your username, password, and other credentials confidential. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.section3_2Text: You must use the platform only for legal purposes. We are not responsible for uploading, sharing, or accessing content that violates copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property rights. Users should only access content they legally own or have permission to access.
terms.section3_3Item1: Using the platform for illegal activities
terms.section3_3Item2: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to others' accounts
terms.section3_3Item3: Attempting to disrupt the security or operation of the platform
terms.section3_3Item4: Uploading malicious software, viruses, or malicious code
terms.section3_3Item5: Abusing the platform with automated systems or bots
terms.section3_3Item6: Violating the rights of other users
terms.section4Text1: The platform and its content (software, design, texts, graphics, logos, etc.) are owned by us or parties we have licensed and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.section4Text2: By using the platform, you do not acquire the right to copy, distribute, modify, or use our content for commercial purposes. The platform is licensed only for personal, non-commercial use.
terms.section5Text1: The platform may integrate with third-party services such as Xtreme Code API and M3U playlist format. The use of these third-party services is subject to the relevant third party's own terms of service.
terms.section5Text2: We are not responsible for the availability, reliability, or content of third-party services. Users are responsible for their interactions with third-party services.
terms.section6Text1: We do not commit to providing the platform uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. Service interruptions may occur due to maintenance, updates, or technical issues.
terms.section6Text2: We reserve the right to change, suspend, or terminate the features, functionality, or availability of the platform without prior notice.
terms.section7Text1: The platform is provided "as is" and "as available". We make no express or implied warranties. We are not liable for direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the platform.
terms.section7Text2: Users use the platform at their own risk. We are not responsible for data loss, profit loss, or other damages arising from the use of the platform.
terms.section8Text: You agree to indemnify us, our directors, employees, and agents from all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorney fees) arising from your violation of these Terms, violation of third-party rights, or illegal use of the platform.
terms.section9Text1: If we detect that you have violated these Terms, we reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account without prior notice.
terms.section9Text2: You may terminate your account at any time. When the account is terminated, data associated with your account may be deleted.
terms.section10Text1: These Terms are interpreted according to international law principles. Any dispute arising from or related to these Terms will first be attempted to be resolved through friendly negotiations.
terms.section10Text2: If disputes cannot be resolved, parties may apply to appropriate judicial authorities. However, both parties agree to first consider alternative dispute resolution methods (mediation, arbitration, etc.).
terms.section11_1Text: If any provision of these Terms becomes invalid or unenforceable, this does not affect the validity of other provisions.
terms.section11_2Text: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us and replace all previous agreements.
terms.section11_3Text: You may not assign your rights or obligations under these Terms to a third party.
terms.section11_4Text: Our waiver of any provision of these Terms does not mean we waive the future application of that provision.
terms.section12Text: For questions regarding these Terms, please contact us through our support page.
terms.acceptance: By accepting these Terms of Service, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted all the conditions above.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText1: As IPTV Manager ("We", "Our", "Platform"), we respect the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy describes the information we collect, use, store, and share when you use our platform.
privacy.introText2: Reading this policy will help you understand how the information we collect through the platform is processed. By using the platform, you are deemed to have accepted this Privacy Policy.
privacy.section1_1Text: When you create an account, we collect information such as username, email address, and password. This information is used to manage your account and provide platform services.
privacy.section1_2Text: Xtreme Code and M3U account information (server URLs, usernames, passwords) that you add using the platform is stored on your device (localStorage) and can optionally be securely stored on our servers by associating it with your account.
privacy.section1_3Text: Technical information about how the platform is used (IP address, browser type, device information, access times) may be collected automatically. This information is used to improve the service and ensure security.
privacy.section1_4Text: Information you provide when submitting support requests or contacting us (name, email, message content) is collected and used only to respond to your request.
privacy.section2Intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
privacy.section2Item2: Creating, managing, and protecting your account
privacy.section2Item8: Notifying about important updates or changes
privacy.section3Intro: We do not share your personal information with third parties except in the following cases:
privacy.section3_1Text: We may work with trusted third-party service providers (hosting, database, analytics) to operate the platform. These providers can only access information for service provision purposes and are bound by privacy commitments.
privacy.section3_2Text: We may be required to share your information in case of a legal obligation, court order, or request from an authorized authority.
privacy.section3_3Text: In case of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, user information may be transferred. In such cases, we will notify users.
privacy.section3_4Text: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.
privacy.section4Intro: We use industry-standard security measures to ensure the security of your information. These measures include:
privacy.section4Text: However, please note that data transmission over the internet is not 100% secure. While we do our best to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.section5Text1: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as long as necessary to provide services. When you delete your account, your personal information will be deleted or anonymized within a reasonable time.
privacy.section5Text2: Some information may be retained for a certain period due to our legal obligations (data retention, tax records, etc.).
privacy.section6Intro: According to data protection laws, you have the following rights:
privacy.section6Item1Text: You can request access to your personal data.
privacy.section6Item2Text: You can request correction of incorrect or incomplete information.
privacy.section6Item3Text: You can request deletion of your data under certain conditions.
privacy.section6Item4Text: You can object to the processing of your data.
privacy.section6Item5Text: You can request transfer of your data to another service.
privacy.section6Item6Text: You can request restriction of processing of your data.
privacy.section6Text: You can contact us through our support page to exercise these rights.
privacy.section7Text1: The platform may use cookies and similar technologies to provide the service and improve user experience. Cookies are small text files stored in your browser.
privacy.section7Text2: You can manage cookies from your browser settings. However, disabling some cookies may cause some features of the platform to not work.
privacy.section8Text: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these links. When you visit third-party sites, we recommend that you review the privacy policies of those sites.
privacy.section9Text1: The platform does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If we discover that we have collected information from a child under 13, we will immediately delete that information.
privacy.section9Text2: If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacy.section10Text1: Your information may be processed and stored in the countries where the platform's servers are located. We may transfer your data internationally under appropriate security measures.
privacy.section10Text2: Countries where your data is transferred may have different data protection laws. In such cases, we take appropriate security measures.
privacy.section11Text1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. In case of significant changes, we will notify you (via email or through the platform).
privacy.section11Text2: The date when changes take effect is stated at the top of the policy. Your continued use of the platform after changes means you accept the updated policy.
privacy.section12Text: This policy has been prepared in accordance with international data protection standards. Local data protection laws (GDPR, CCPA, etc.) of the countries where users are located may apply, and compliance with these laws is ensured.
privacy.section13Text: For questions, concerns, or to exercise your rights regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our support page.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text1: This Cookie Policy explains how the StreamHub platform uses cookies and similar technologies. By using the platform, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
introduction.text2: Cookies are small text files used for the proper functioning of websites, improving user experience, and site analytics.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.text1: Cookies are small text files that are saved to your device (computer, tablet, or mobile device) when you visit a website. These files help the website remember your preferences and provide you with a better experience.
whatAreCookies.text2: Cookies enhance website functionality and personalize the user experience. For example, they remember your language preference so you can use the same language on every visit.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are necessary for the website to perform its basic functions. For example, they are used for session management, security, and site navigation. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.text: These cookies help the website provide enhanced functionality and personalization features. For example, they are used to remember your language preference and save your user settings.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.text: These cookies help us understand how the website is used. They collect information such as visitor count, page views, and user behavior. This information is used to improve the site.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.text: These cookies are used to show you more relevant ads and content. Currently, our platform does not use marketing cookies.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.text1: You can manage your cookie preferences using your browser settings. Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can reject cookies or receive warnings about cookie usage from your browser settings.
managing.text2: If you disable cookies, some features of the website may not work properly. To manage cookies:
managing.option1: You can change your cookie preferences from your browser settings
managing.option2: You can use your browser settings to delete specific cookies
managing.option3: You can completely disable cookies (however, this may affect site functionality)

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.text: Our platform currently does not use third-party cookies. If third-party services are added in the future, this policy will be updated.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. In case of significant changes, we will notify you. You can continue using the site to accept the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have questions about our cookie policy, please contact us through our support page.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Usage
cookieConsent.message: This website uses cookies to provide you with the best experience. By continuing to use the site, you consent to our use of cookies.

seo.homeTitle: StreamHub - IPTV Management Platform | Xtreme Code & M3U Playlist
seo.homeDescription: Manage your Xtreme Code and M3U playlist accounts with StreamHub, watch live TV channels. Secure and user-friendly IPTV management platform.
seo.keywords: IPTV, Xtreme Code, M3U playlist, live TV, streaming, video player, IPTV management
